name: Lofi Ducky to Dodge/Chill With
description:
A one button bullet hell game designed to be pretty and chill, but also frustrating and arcade-y. An uncertain game for uncertain times...

Click, tap, or just press space or wasd or something to play. I don't know man, you do your own thing.

Also, at the insistence of my one playtester, I have added a chill mode for each level so you can take in the soundscape and be a ducky/bunny in peace for a minute if you want.

Bearing in mind that I am no artist, I'm happy with how this turned out! My first time playing with shaders and I'm proud of what I managed to do

This was made for the BeatTheBoredom Jam, and hopefully gives a little slice of the peaceful outdoors in people's homes.

And, if you turn on full bee mode, you can remember the horrors of the outside world too. You're welcome.

This game was inspired by the artwork of 1041uuu: https://1041uuu.tumblr.com/

Music by the brilliant Anttis instrumentals - https://www.soundclick.com/artist/default.cfm?bandID=1277008&content=songs&curre...
